wikipedia_page.main: General Sir John James Stibbon,  (5 January 1935 – 9 February 2014) was a senior British Army officer who served as Master-General of the Ordnance from 1987 to 1991.

response: * General Sir John Stibbon OBE, Chief Royal Engineer from 1993–9
